title: Dexter : The Game pc
description:
DEXTER follows Dexter Morgan, a forensic blood spatter expert for the Miami Dade Police Department whose perfectly respectable persona hides a dark compulsion: he is a serial killer who hunts down people who have escaped justice.

Features
Hours of game play with tense action in 3D environments as Dexter stalks his prey.
Over 1100 lines of dialogue, including original voice-overs from Michael C. Hall.
Includes an original storyline with writing by series producer Tim Schlattmann.
Advance dynamic audio support, includes ducking and 3D sound.
Exclusive Blood Spatter analysis game just like Dexter does it on the TV series.
Scale fences, pick locks and decode passwords.

Tech Info
Year: 2011
Genre: Adventure / 3D/HOG
Developer: Icarus Studios
Publisher: Marc Ecko Entertainment
Platform: PC

Minimum System Requirements
System: Microsoft Windows 2000/XP/Vista/Windows 7
